alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 2:04AM CST until January 01 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... East central Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CST. * At 204 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenway, or near Kennett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Portageville, Hayti, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Wardell, Greenway, Bolton, Bragg City, Pascola, Nimmons, Lorine, West Kennett, Bell City, Noland, Carryville, Holly Island, Rhyne and North Wardell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and western Tennessee.
